items.sentence: Only interrupt me if it's strictly necessary.

Tom knew Mary would get angry if he did that.
Any time you need anything, just let me know.
Construction is set to begin late in October.
I don't intend to make a deal with the devil.
Lack of sleep may be impairing your judgment.
The project is being discussed at the moment.
I wanted you to know how much you mean to me.
Do you act differently when you speak French?

There are a lot of things that we need to do.
